subject: ANNOUNCE - new version of JFCUnit
msgSnippet: A new version of the JUnit extension JFCUnit has been released. JFCUnit enables you to write test cases for Java Swing-based applications. It provides support
messageBody:
A new version of the JUnit extension JFCUnit has been released.

JFCUnit enables you to write test cases for Java Swing-based applications.
It provides support for obtaining handles on windows opened by your code,
locating components within a component hierarchy, raising events on
components (e.g., clicking a button), and handling testing of components in
a thread-safe manner.

Changes: Incorporated various patches. Added support for JTree. Various bug
fixes and minor feature enhancements.

Project home page is here:
http://sourceforge.net/projects/jfcunit

Download from here:
http://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/jfcunit/jfcunit0.2pre-beta.zip
